scripts.test: npx cucumber-js --config cucumber.config.js && npm run report:generate:open
scripts.test:chromium: cross-env BROWSER=chromium npm test && npm run report:generate:open
scripts.test:firefox: cross-env BROWSER=firefox npm test && npm run report:generate:open
scripts.test:webkit: cross-env BROWSER=webkit npm test && npm run report:generate:open
scripts.test:all-browsers: npm run test:chromium && npm run test:firefox && npm run test:webkit && npm run report:generate:open
scripts.test:parallel: npx cucumber-js --config cucumber.config.js --parallel 4 && npm run report:generate:open
scripts.test:parallel:chromium: cross-env BROWSER=chromium npm run test:parallel && npm run report:generate:open
scripts.test:parallel:firefox: cross-env BROWSER=firefox npm run test:parallel && npm run report:generate:open
scripts.test:parallel:webkit: cross-env BROWSER=webkit npm run test:parallel && npm run report:generate:open
scripts.report:generate:open: npm run report:generate && npm run report:open
